CustomField.formula: ( MOP__c + Additional_Aviation_Margin__c + Barge_Fee__c + Broker_Fee__c + Conco_Standard_Fee_tonne__c + Delco_Additional_Margin_tonne__c + Delco_Margin__c + Discount_tonne__c + Intra_Plane_Cost__c + Other_Costs__c + Transport_Costs_tonne__c ) * Volume__c
CustomField.label: Customer Price
